description: Literally "psychological state of an empty cup". It means when learning something new, one must set aside past achievements and pride, and start with a humble attitude like a beginner, without preconceived notions.

examples.chinese: 具备空杯心态,人生随时都准备好了重新归零再重启的勇气
examples.translation: Possessing the empty cup mentality means having the courage to restart life from zero at any time

examples.chinese: 确实需要空杯心态,要学会忘记过去的成绩,放下你所谓的自尊
examples.translation: Indeed need an empty cup mentality, learn to forget past achievements and put down your so-called pride

examples.chinese: 空杯心态就是不让杯子满到溢出,而是经常倾倒,让自己有空间去接纳新的事物
examples.translation: Empty cup mentality is not letting the cup overflow, but frequently emptying it to make space to accept new things
